title: Still needs work
review: It can be considered an alternative to Canva, but it‚Äôs too limited. Almost every icon and illustration requires you to purchase the premium product. Like out of 15 templates, only 1 is free. I tried using one of the templates, everything looks fine until I saved it. There‚Äôs no option like Canva to save as PDF or JPEG, and the saved image is different from what I see in the app where the elements and icons are all over the place.
